mapper.select: SELECT @ROWNUM :=@ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM , B.AR_ID , B.SBJ , B.CONT , B.WRITER , DATE_FORMAT(B.CRT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') CRT_DT , B.MDFY_DT , B.RD_CNT FROM BOARD B , (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R ORDER BY B.AR_ID DESC
SELECT B.AR_ID , B.SBJ , B.CONT , B.WRITER , DATE_FORMAT(B.CRT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') CRT_DT , B.MDFY_DT , B.RD_CNT FROM BOARD B WHERE B.AR_ID = #{articleId}
